message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $950000. This is a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $850000, but no more. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm not willing to go below $900000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $870000, but no more. Can you consider my offer?
